EcmaScript6 Examples - array - find

Method copyWithin from an array in EcmaScript 6 have the function of copy a part of array over another part.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    let arr1 = [1,3,5,10];
                    console.log(arr1.copyWithin(2, 0)); //=> [1, 3, 1, 3]

                    arr1 = [1,3,5,10];
                    console.log(arr1.copyWithin(0,2));  //=> [5, 10, 5, 10]

The copyWithin method have two parameters, the first one is "to" and the second one is "from". Is possible to pick up a part in front of the array and put in the end, or vice versa.
